## AnswersConfig type

The main configuration options for [AnswersCore](./answers-headless.answerscore.md)<!-- -->. For a full description of the options, see [BaseAnswersConfig](./answers-headless.baseanswersconfig.md)<!-- -->. The config requires either an apiKey or a token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AnswersConfig = AnswersConfigWithApiKey | AnswersConfigWithToken;
```
